job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: <ul><li>3+ years of hands-on experience in Site Reliability, DevOps and/or Software&nbsp;Delivery for commercial&nbsp;large scale&nbsp;cloud&nbsp;software or services</li><li>Good understanding of public cloud offerings such as Azure, Google Cloud or AWS</li><li>Experience&nbsp;with&nbsp;coding&nbsp;languages (C++, C#, Java, .NET) and&nbsp;proficiency&nbsp;in&nbsp;debugging, and live-site troubleshooting during an outage</li><li>Strong background in monitoring, disaster recovery, and automation</li><li>Excellent communication skills&nbsp;both oral and written</li><li>Experience with Kubernetes, Docker, Terraform or other Infrastructure as Code, CI/CD preferred</li><li>Our ideal candidate will demonstrate strong customer empathy, show a strong bias for action, be adaptable and possess strong interpersonal skill</li></ul><p><br></p>
